bug.author: shubham-seth
bug.description: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tensorflow' Traceback: File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/streamlit/ScriptRunner.py", line 322, in _run_script exec(code, module.dict) File "/home/ubuntu/Sumit/Sumit/creating_UI.py", line 5, in import tensorflow as tf I am working on an aws machine with a tensorflow environment. Tensorflow ideally works fine.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shubham-seth>@shubham-seth</denchmark-link> , Can you verify that you can import tensorflow without Streamlit?
